description: This file is a test suite for the HelloWorld Vue component, written using Vitest testing framework. It imports testing utilities and the component, then performs a test to verify that the component renders the expected text.

methods.name: Test case: 'renders properly'
methods.description: Test to verify that HelloWorld component renders the specified message

ctags.name: wrapper
ctags.pattern: /^    const wrapper = mount(HelloWorld, { props: { msg: 'Hello Vitest' } })$/
